definition: to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: In order to make strong shot, a player must be able to hold racket very hard.
sentences.chinese: 为了击球有力，选手必须将拍子抓得非常紧。

sentences.english: He beat time on the accelerator .
sentences.chinese: 他用脚在加速器上打拍子。

sentences.english: To me, it's clothes and racquets.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说，它们只是衣服和拍子。

sentences.english: He whips that "log" of a racquet around like a swizzle-stick.
sentences.chinese: 他甩动这笨得象木头的拍子如同耍调酒的小棍。

sentences.english: You beat time and I'll play.
When I bought it, it was one of the better racquets made.
sentences.chinese: 当初买的时候，还是一个比较好的拍子。

sentences.english: Students who start HT can end up with undetected mistakes in counting.
sentences.chinese: 如果一开始就用合手，经常会无法察觉拍子数错了。

sentences.english: Every time I play a match I like to get my racquets re-strung.
sentences.chinese: 每次偶比赛都喜欢把拍子重新上线。

sentences.english: They just stick it over a dance beat and call it a remix.
sentences.chinese: 他们加入了舞蹈的拍子，说这个就是混音。

sentences.english: Now when I play CDs, you hum and tap your feet.
sentences.chinese: 现在我放cd盘，你一边呼，一边用脚打拍子了。

sentences.english: They skip rope and play table tennis with paddles made from floor tiles.
sentences.chinese: 他们跳绳，用天花板制成的拍子玩乒乓。

sentences.english: At the end he cracked his racket onthe ground in fury.
sentences.chinese: 最终，他愤怒地把拍子摔到地上。

sentences.english: The students clapped out a regular time while the teacher played the tune.
sentences.chinese: 教师弹奏曲子时，学生们打着拍子。

sentences.english: He beat time with his fingers.
Myth - The racket turning in your hand means you did not hold on tight enough.
sentences.chinese: 手中的拍子转动了，那是因为你没有握紧拍柄。

definition: to beat time/to mark rhythm on drum or clapper boards
club (golf)/cue (billiards)/also written 球桿|球杆[qiu2 gan1]
